duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in Discovery Meetings with customers to understand assignments requirements.
Manage all sourcing activities and talent pipelines using various channels in order to fulfill client assignments.
Stay organized and conduct research such as average salary and qualifications.
Design job descriptions and interview questions per assignments prerequisites.
Establish candidates’ credentials and fit for the role by conducting interviews, analyzing responses and comparing qualifications.
Document interactions, outreach, and screening results; present shortlist of candidates in a timely manner.
Build strong relationships with clients. Identify their recruiting needs and wants and encourage customer feedback.
Develop effective working relationships with colleagues and clients.
Create a healthy and motivating work environment and atmosphere. Listen to team members’ feedback.
Offer honest feedback to Operations Excellence Manager to streamline the recruiting process.
Identify opportunities to improve performance, develop initiatives, and roll-out solutions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
